product_name: Organic India The Tulsi Original - 100 g: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: Excellent product! My mother is using this since she has cough problem. It builds the immunity. Earlier I was confused about buying it but really itâ€™s good.

It is an excellent product with wonderful health benefits. Little goes a long way especially if you're steeping the product for 5 full minutes. It gives a robust aroma and full bodied taste.I had a cold on the day I recieved this product, I've had it twice before I wrote this review and it has already helped a lot with my cold.The product came well packed in a sturdy airtight container and you can easily use it directly from said container, no need to transfer it to another container.
Well packed, Aromatic, and makes excellent tea with added Darjeeling tea leaves.However, unjustifiably overpriced. Appropriate price Rs.120/- Rs. 150/- .

This is a product that I have been using since a long time now and I have purchased this online, the first time ever. While the product is good as always, the tin can this product comes in, was severely damaged when I received it, not what I would expect from Amazon. 4 stars given here are for the sheer quality of the product from the manufacturer.

reviews.review_title: No doubt  its a organic  tea but full of dust , durt
reviews.review_body: Very nice and genuine, pure organic products .  Flavor  is also Perfect  "Original  Tulshi".Moreover  after drinking , feel energetic . Packing  was also awesome .  However  but air tight container . Its completely made of by tulshi leaves.but full of dust and dirt,  after using filter , tea is still fealthy..disappointed results

reviews.review_title: Not bad but didn't like it much.
reviews.review_body: Not bad but didn't like it much. The flavor is far from what we get from real Tulsi leaves.I paid Rs. 198.56 for 2 packs.
Rate fluctuations. During Prime day sale its costly and during normal days, its cheaper
Healthy drink, one who want to loss weight the green tea is the best option that one can opt.Initially it's little bit difficult to get familiar with this but once you start you love it
